# Daniel Tureck â€” Mix Engineer

> Daniel Tureck is a mix engineer based in Long Beach, California, working out of Robot Slap Studios. He specializes in R&B, Hip-Hop, Soul, Pop, and podcast/brand audio production.

## Music Mixing

Daniel mixes records for independent and signed artists across R&B, Hip-Hop, Soul and Pop. His approach is detail-oriented, bringing clarity and depth to every mix. He works both remotely and in-studio at Robot Slap Studios in Long Beach, CA.

## Podcast & Brand Audio Services

Daniel provides end-to-end audio post-production for podcasts and branded content:

- **Podcast Mixing**: Full mix of dialogue, music and sound effects for broadcast-ready episodes
- **Podcast Editing**: Dialogue editing, timing, pacing and cleanup
- **Sound Design**: Custom sound design, transitions and sonic branding
- **Mastering**: Final loudness, EQ and format delivery for all streaming platforms
- **Scoring**: Original music and underscore composed to fit show tone and arc
- **Commercial Audio**: Audio production for TV spots, branded content and media campaigns

## Notable Clients

Disney, Audible, Hulu, Vox Media, iHeart Media, MSNBC, History Channel, Spotify, Stephen Curry, Amy Poehler, LA Times, Red Bull Records, Manscaped, CDPH, Opera Web Browser.

- [Homepage](https://danismixing.com/): Music mixing portfolio with before/after audio demos
